144750.<pc>は 妖精の実 １３個を使って\nアマリリスの笑顔を 手に入れた！<me:
<pc> used 13 Fairy Fruits to receive
Amaryllis' smile!<me 60>

144751.「なによ！ あなたが笑えって 言ったんでしょ？\n 珍しいもの見た～ みたいな顔:
What! You told me to laugh, didn't you? Don't
look at me like you've seen something unusual.
Do you want to get your armpits tickeled?

144752.「でも 私が笑うだけで 苦労して手に入れた実を\n 無償で 渡してくれるなんて\:
But you are so good-natured to give me my
hard-earned fruit for free just because I
laugh at you.

144753.「あなたのおかげで なんだか私まで\n 幸せな気持ちに なれちゃったじゃない。: You have made me feel happy, too.

144755.どこからともなく 謎の声が ひびいた……。: A mysterious voice cracked out of nowhere...

144756.<center><pc>……\nあなたの おこないは 見ておりました。:
<pc>...
I have been watching what you are doing.

144757.<center>真に優しき心を持つ あなたには\nささやかな幸せが 返ってきてい:
You, who have a truly kind heart, will receive
a little happiness back. Check out the
Adventurer's Square.

150550.この世界に 平和が 戻ったようだ。: And the world knew peace once more!

154484.「ありがとうございます！ 調査の結果\n <pc>さんが ただひとりの\n ゴー:
Thank you! After much research, <pc>
has been certified as the only Golden Knight!

154485.「ボク もう なんてお礼を言ったらいいのか…… \n <pc>さんは 言い伝えど:
I don't know how to thank you...
<pc>, you were the savior of Lottery
Land, just like the legend says!

154486.「あ あれ？ どうして 涙なんか……\n ボク 大好きな ふくびきランドのみんな:
What is it? Why are you crying... I thought I
had to save everyone in Lottery Land that I
love so much...

154487.「ご……ごめんなさい。今は 王女のボクが\n しっかりしないと いけないよね？<:
I...I'm sorry. I'm the princess now, I have to
be firm, right?<yesno><close>

154488.「えへへ。<pc>さんって\n まるで 物語に出てくる 王子様みたい！\n よか:
Hehe. <pc>, you are like a prince in
a story! If you like, could you accept this?

154489.<pc>は スノーベルから\nスノーベルプリズムを もらった！<se_nots:
<pc> received a Snow Bell Prism from
Snow Bell!<se_nots System 7>

154490.「あのね ふくびきランドには その……\n すっ 好きな人に……手作りの物を贈っ:
In Lottery Land, there's a custom of giving a
handmade gift to the person you love to
express your feelings...

154491.「え えっとね ボクね……\n <pc>さんと もっと仲良くなりたくて\n それ:
Well, you see... <pc> I wanted to get
to know you better, so I made that.

154492.「えへへ。初めて作ったから\n あまり 上手じゃないかもしれないけど……\n よ:
Hehehe. I made it for the first time, so it
might not be very good... but you can use it
if you like!

183467.<center>さあ 今こそ\nひかりのたまを 使うのです！: You must use the Sphere of Light!

183468.光の糸が 大魔王に からみつき\n闇のころもを はぎとった！:
Threads of light snaked their way around
Zoma, shattering his cloak of darkness!

183469.「ほほう……。\n わが 闇のころもの守りを無にする\n すべを 知っていたとは:
Hm hm hm! So you have learnt how to overcome
the wards of sorcery that protect me?

183470.「しかし 無駄なこと……。\n さあ わがウデの中で\n もがき 苦しむが よい:
It matters not. Come! Dash yourselves on the
unfeeling shoals of my might!

183918.アレフガルドの大地に 光が 戻ったようだ。: Light has returned to the land of Alefgard.

186725.「勇者よ！\n わが いけにえの祭壇へ よくぞ来た！:
So, Hero, here you are at long last...
Here at the place of my sacrifice!
The altar to my greatness!

186726.「われこそは すべてを滅ぼすもの！\n すべての命を わが いけにえとし\n 絶:
I am Zoma, bringer of oblivion! All life shall
be sacrificed to my glory! All shall despair!
All shall kneel!

186727.「勇者よ わが いけにえとなれい！: Come, Hero! Offer yourself unto me!

186728.「出でよ わが しもべたち！\n こやつらを滅ぼし\n その苦しみを わしに さ:
Arise, my minions! Obliterate them! Let me
feast upon their suffering!

186835.<pc>たちは\nひかりのたまを 高く ささげた！\nあたりに まばゆいばかりの:
<pc> reverently offers up the
Sphere of Light! A blinding light shines
all around!

274677.「勇者よ！\n なにゆえ もがき 生きるのか？: Hero! Still you cling pathetically to life?

274678.「滅びこそ わが よろこび。\n 死にゆく者こそ 美しい。:
Very well. It seems only right that I, who
will take such pleasure in your death, should
deal the killing blow myself.

274679.「さあ わがウデの中で 息絶えるがよい！: Come! Show me how beautifully you die!

274680.「勇者よ……。\n よくぞ わしを 倒した。:
Hero... You have done well to...defeat
me...

274681.「だが 光あるかぎり\n 闇も また ある……。:
But as long as there is light... so too must
there be darkness...

274682.「わしには 見えるのだ。\n ふたたび 何者かが\n 闇から 現れよう……。:
I see it... I see that is which to come...
Another darkness shall rise... Another shall
take my place...

274683.「だが その時は お前は\n 年老いて 生きては いまい。\n わははは……っ。:
And when he does...you will be powerless to
protect your craven kind...for you will be
long dead...! Hm hm... Hm...
